comprehensive_overview: EasyBuild is an open-source software build and installation framework that allows users to manage the installation of software packages on High Performance Computing (HPC) systems easily.
core_features:
1. Simplifies the building and installation process of software packages on HPC systems.
2. Provides a module system to manage software installations.
3. Supports different compilers, toolchains, and dependencies.
4. Allows for easy customization and extension.
